original_text: And was there until the death of Herod: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying, Out of Egypt have I called my son.
korean_text: 헤롯이 죽기까지 거기 있었으니 이는 주께서 선지자를 통하여 말씀하신 바 애굽으로부터 내 아들을 불렀다 함을 이루려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: And was there until the death of Herod:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 헤롭이 죽을 때까지 그곳에 있었다:

sentences.original_text: which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,
Out of Egypt have I called my son.
